author: La rédaction avec AFP
title: Etats-Unis. Les salariés de Boeing votent la grève à une écrasante majorité
text: Etats-Unis Les salariés de Boeing votent la grève à une écrasante majorité 96% des salariés de Boeing de la région de Seattle, ont voté en faveur d'une grève dès ce vendredi, rejetant la nouvelle convention proposée par l'avionneur américain. Les salariés de Boeing de la région de Seattle, aux Etats-Unis, ont voté à une très large majorité en faveur d'une grève dès ce vendredi, rejetant la nouvelle convention proposée par l'avionneur américain en difficulté, a annoncé leur syndicat. Les travailleurs ont rejeté la convention à 94,6% et voté jeudi soir la grève à 96%, a précisé Jon Holden, président du syndicat des machinistes IAM-District 751. « Nous ferons grève à minuit », soit à 8h heure de Paris ce vendredi, a-t-il ajouté. « Nos membres se sont exprimés haut et fort ce soir », a affirmé Holden, dont le syndicat qui représente environ 33 000 travailleurs dans le nord-ouest du Pacifique, avait initialement soutenu l'accord. Holden avait auparavant déclaré ne pas pouvoir « garantir que nous obtiendrons davantage en faisant grève ». Boeing se dit « engagé » dans les négociations malgré la grève Le groupe Boeing a déclaré être « engagé » dans des négociations en dépit du vote massif de ses salariés e, faveur de la grève. « Nous restons déterminés à rétablir nos relations avec nos employés et le syndicat, et nous sommes prêts à retourner à la table des négociations pour parvenir à un nouvel accord », a déclaré Boeing ce vendredi. Fermeture de deux usines La grève entraînera la fermeture de deux grandes usines d'assemblage d'avions dans la région de Puget Sound - les deux tiers des votes étaient nécessaires pour lancer un arrêt de travail dès l'expiration jeudi à minuit de la convention actuelle, vieille de 16 ans. Elle va paralyser la production du 737, du 777 et du 767 cargo, dont les livraisons cumulent déjà les retards. Une situation d'autant plus problématique que l'avionneur encaisse la plus grosse partie du paiement (environ 60%) à la remise des avions. Selon les analystes de TD Cowen, une grève de 50 jours priverait Boeing de 3 à 3,5 milliards de dollars de liquidités et aurait un impact de 5,5 milliards sur le chiffre d'affaires. Le vote de jeudi marque un rejet décisif d'un accord qui, selon les travailleurs, était bien moins généreux que ne l'affirmaient les dirigeants de Boeing. Cette nouvelle convention, qui concerne les adhérents de l'IAM dans la région de Seattle (nord-ouest), prévoyait une hausse salariale de 25% sur quatre ans ainsi qu'un engagement d'investissements dans la région. Et aussi la construction du prochain avion - annoncé pour 2035 - dans le berceau historique de l'avionneur qui devait assurer des emplois pour plusieurs décennies. Revendications salariales Boeing espérait que ces concessions suffiraient à esquiver une grève, alors que sa situation financière est précaire depuis le crash de deux 737 MAX 8 en 2018 et en 2019, ayant coûté la vie à 346 personnes, et une multitude de problèmes de qualité de la production. « Ce n'est un secret pour personne: notre activité traverse une période difficile, en partie à cause de nos propres erreurs du passé. (...) Une grève mettrait en péril notre reprise commune », avait prévenu mercredi soir Kelly Ortberg, qui a succédé le 8 août à Dave Calhoun au poste de directeur général de l'avionneur américain. Il avait exhorté les employés à ne pas « sacrifier » les progrès futurs en raison de « frustrations liées au passé ». Mais les mécontents jugent la hausse salariale trop éloignée des demandes du syndicat (+40% initialement) et le volet sur les retraites insatisfaisant. Une semaine après sa prise de fonction, Ortberg s'était engagé à « réinitialiser » la relation avec l'IAM. Mais à la lecture de l'accord, de nombreux syndiqués ont réagi négativement et plaidé pour un arrêt de travail. « On nous a bradés », a lancé jeudi Kamie Bryan, employée chez Boeing depuis 18 ans, après avoir voté contre l'accord et pour la grève. « Nous ne devrions pas prendre ces quelques sous qu'ils nous donnent et être reconnaissants », a-t-elle relevé, insistant sur l'ampleur des « revenus du patron ». La dernière grève chez l'avionneur américain remonte à 2008 et avait duré 57 jours.

author: Jerzy Lewandowski
title: COSCO Introduces Groundbreaking Electric Containerships in China
text:
COSCO Introduces Groundbreaking Electric Containerships in China
Summary: China witnesses a significant leap in maritime innovation as COSCO Shipping takes a stride towards sustainability by deploying the largest battery-powered containerships to date. Built to operate along the Yangtze River, these vessels boast a revolutionary swappable battery system, negating the need for charging stops and enhancing efficiency in goods transport between Shanghai and Wuhan.
In a bold move towards sustainable maritime transport, China’s COSCO Shipping has ushered two electric containerships into service, positioning them as the most substantial electric vessels ever built. COSCO Shipping Green Water 01 and 02 represent a pivotal step in establishing an eco-friendly shipping network on the Yangtze River, which is pivotal to China’s domestic trade.
These innovative ships are each equipped with a remarkable battery capacity exceeding 50,000 kilowatt-hours, stored in standardized shipping containers for ease of exchange. This unique battery arrangement allows each vessel to carry up to 700 TEU (Twenty-foot Equivalent Units) without the immediate necessity for recharging. The design serves to avoid any disruptions caused by recharging cycles, ensuring that the vessels can complete entire journeys—a stretch of over 600 nautical miles—between Shanghai and Wuhan uninterrupted.
Embracing the potential of battery power, these containerships also signal a technological advancement with smart ship features, including integrated navigation and energy management systems which promise to optimize their operational capabilities.
Launching the production phase in March 2022, COSCO executed a swift construction timeline with the first steel cut in December, leading to the ships’ completion and subsequent launch within a year.
These pioneering vessels, each boasting a 10,000-tonnage, are components of China’s grand vision to foster a green and intelligent shipping route on the Yangtze by 2030. As COSCO Shipping Green Water 01 and 02 venture along their riverine route, they stand as a testament to China’s commitment to reducing the maritime industry’s environmental footprint and pioneering the transition to clean energy in global shipping.
FAQ Section on COSCO Shipping’s Electric Containerships
What has COSCO Shipping achieved in the realm of maritime innovation?
COSCO Shipping has introduced two electric containerships, COSCO Shipping Green Water 01 and 02, which are the largest battery-powered containerships to date. These vessels are specially designed to operate on the Yangtze River without the need for frequent charging stops.
Why are these vessels considered innovative?
The innovation lies in their substantial battery capacity that exceeds 50,000 kilowatt-hours, organized in swappable battery containers. This design allows the vessels to transport up to 700 TEUs and voyage over 600 nautical miles between Shanghai and Wuhan uninterrupted. Additionally, integrated smart ship features, such as navigation and energy management systems, enhance their operational capabilities.
What is the significance of the battery system used in these ships?
The battery system’s significance is two-fold: firstly, the use of standardized shipping containers for batteries simplifies the process of swapping them, eliminating the need for lengthy recharging periods. Secondly, the large battery capacity ensures that these electric containerships can cover long distances without recharging, thus maintaining the efficiency of goods transport along the Yangtze River.
How does this development contribute to sustainability in maritime transport?
These vessels represent a significant leap toward reducing the environmental footprint of the maritime industry by leveraging clean energy. By operating on battery power, COSCO Shipping’s containerships aim to establish a green shipping network and contribute to China’s vision of an eco-friendly and intelligent shipping route on the Yangtze River by 2030.
What smart features are included in these containerships?
The containerships are equipped with smart ship features that include advanced integrated systems for navigation and energy management. These technologies aim to optimize the operational efficiency of the vessels.
Can you detail the timeline for the production of these electric vessels?
The production phase began in March 2022, with the first steel cut occurring in December. COSCO Shipping managed to complete the construction and deployment of these containerships within a mere year.
How do these vessels align with China’s larger goals for shipping?
COSCO Shipping Green Water 01 and 02 are integral to China’s broader objective of building a green and intelligent shipping route on the Yangtze River by the year 2030. They showcase China’s dedication to leading the transition towards clean energy in the global shipping industry.
Definitions
– TEU (Twenty-foot Equivalent Unit): A measurement used to describe the capacity of container ships and terminals. It is based on the volume of a 20-foot-long (6.1 m) shipping container.
– Kilowatt-hour (kWh): A unit of energy equivalent to one kilowatt (1 kW) of power expended for one hour (1 h) of time. It is commonly used to measure electricity consumption.
– Nautical miles: A unit of distance used in maritime and aviation contexts, equal to approximately 1.1508 miles or 1.852 kilometers.
Related Links
–
COSCO Shipping – The official website of COSCO Shipping, a leading global maritime transport company.
Jerzy Lewandowski, a visionary in the realm of virtual reality and augmented reality technologies, has made significant contributions to the field with his pioneering research and innovative designs. His work primarily focuses on enhancing user experience and interaction within virtual environments, pushing the boundaries of immersive technology. Lewandowski’s groundbreaking projects have gained recognition for their ability to merge the digital and physical worlds, offering new possibilities in gaming, education, and professional training. His expertise and forward-thinking approach mark him as a key influencer in shaping the future of virtual and augmented reality applications.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Canada ETA For Czech, Bulgaria, Lithuania, Latvia Citizens | User | times-online.com
text: The Canadian government launched an online visa waiver service for eligible countries in 2015. Citizens of the Czech Republic are among those who do not need a visa to enter Canada for travel, business, or transit. Czech nationals can use the Canadian eTA as an official online travel authorization when visiting Canada. Czech citizens, on the other hand, must apply for a Canada eTA visa if they intend to visit Canada for travel, business, transit, or medical reasons. This visa allows Czech nationals to stay for a maximum of 6 months per visit and is valid for 5 years. When an eTA is accepted, it is digitally linked to the traveler's passport. Those who wish to visit Canada for other purposes, such as study or employment, should get in touch with the Canadian embassy or consulate in their area for more details. Czech travelers who meet all Canadian eTA requirements can start completing the eTA application form online. The form is a simple online questionnaire that takes 20 minutes to complete. Requirements of Canada Visa for Czech Citizens - A valid travel document or passport in order to apply for Canada eTA. - A valid credit or debit card or PayPal account to pay for the Canada eTA. - A valid email address, to receive the Canada eTA in their inbox. Those who already run a successful business in their home country can use the Canadian Business Visa to expand operations or start a new business in Canada. Canada has a plethora of business opportunities. Because of its collection of some of the world's most prestigious cities, developed financial and healthcare systems, and expanding industry, Canada offers excellent business opportunities. Canada is widely regarded as one of the best places in the world to establish a business. Expert entrepreneurs from all over the world are migrating to Canada because of the country's combination of European advantages and a higher standard of living. After having a successful business career in their home country, individuals can expand their current businesses or start new ones in Canada with the help of a special category of visa known as the Canada Business Visa. Your initial length of stay will be determined when you apply for a business visa. The Canada business visa is valid for up to three years and can be extended for an additional two years as long as your business remains active. This period can be extended up to six years. Canada offers a great opportunity for entrepreneurs' businesses. To be eligible for this visa, the applicant must be employed by a Canadian company or work in Canada. DOCUMENTS REQUIRED - A valid Passport & travel history - Background documentation - Documents from your company - A formal invitation from a respected company in the country where you do business is required. - You must have enough money to support yourself and your dependents during your stay. - Documents proving you will not be staying beyond the stipulated time. - Completed application & consulate fees. - Adequate medical insurance CANADA ETA FOR LITHUANIAN CITIZENS The Canadian government implemented this online permission in 2015 to promote foreign travel and visits. Residents of Lithuania and the other 58 countries and territories can visit Canada for a short period of time without a visa. A visa is not required for Canadians to enter Lithuania. Citizens of Lithuania must obtain a Canadian Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA) in order to enter the country. However, if you are a Lithuanian traveling by air, you must apply for a Canadian ETA. You can travel to Canada using this program without obtaining a traditional visa or visiting the Canadian Embassy. Lithuanians must enter Canada with a valid eTA. It allows foreign citizens of select countries to enter Canada for tourism, business, or short-term transit purposes. It is a multiple entry permit, each granting a maximum stay of 180 days. The eTA for Canada is electronically linked to the Lithuanian passport and is valid for 5 years, except for passports that expire earlier. In this case, the Canadian eTA expires at the same time as the passport. Once Lithuanian citizens have confirmed that they meet the eTA requirements, they can proceed to completing the Canadian eTA application form. This is a simple questionnaire that will take you a few minutes to complete. WHAT DOCUMENTS DO I NEED FOR A CANADIAN ETA? - Valid passport – to apply for a Canada ETA, your travel document needs to maintain valid for six more months from your arrival date in Canada. - E-mail – provide a correct email address because we will send your ETA by that email. Besides, we recommend that you print your ETA. - Payments – to pay your request, you can use a credit/debit card or PayPal account. CANADA ETA FOR LATVIAN CITIZENS Latvian citizens wishing to visit Canada must first obtain a Canadian Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA). The Canadian government introduced the eTA in 2015 to alleviate the complications associated with traditional visas. Canada's visa policy allows citizens of a variety of countries, including Latvia, to cross the border without a visa. The Canadian eTA is mandatory for all Latvian citizens who visit Canada for a short period of time. The Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) is a computerized system that allows certain travelers to legally enter Canada. It is only available to residents of certain countries whose citizens (including Latvians) are allowed to enter Canada for short-term tourism, business, or transit purposes. The Canadian eTA is an online multiple entry visa waiver. It is valid for 5 years and allows Latvian visitors to stay in the country for 6 months on each visit. The electronic travel authorization is linked to the traveler's passport and is not transferable to a new document. This means that if a passport expires before the allowed 5 years of the Canadian eTA, then this travel permit expires as well. Latvians who meet the requirements can proceed to the eTA application form for Canada. This form is a simple questionnaire that takes approximately 15 to 20 minutes to complete. WHAT ARE THE REQUIREMENTS? - Valid Passport: You cannot apply for an ETA from Canada if you do not have a valid passport. This document must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of flight. - Email address: You must provide a valid email address as the ETA confirmation will be emailed in PDF format. The ETA is electronically linked to your passport, but you still need to keep a physical copy. - Payment Methods: You can use a credit or debit cards, but you can also use PayPal to pay for the eTA fees. CANADA ETA FOR BULGARIAN CITIZENS If Bulgarian citizens intend to visit Canada for a short period of time, they must obtain a Canadian eTA visa. The Canadian government launched this online visa waiver service for qualifying countries in 2015. It should be noted that any other mode of transportation will necessitate a separate travel authorization. Bulgarian citizens, on the other hand, do not require a visa for leisure, business, or transit purposes. The Canadian eTA applies only to international flights landing in Canada. Bulgarian citizens can enter Canada multiple times for stays of up to six months each by obtaining a Canadian Electronic Travel Authorization. The eTA is valid for five years and is available online. The eTA is electronically linked to Bulgarian visitors' passports and cannot be transferred to a new travel document. This means that if a passport with an approved eTA expires within 5 years, your travel authorization will expire as well. Bulgarians who confirm that they meet the requirements can start the Canadian eTA application process online. The application form is a simple questionnaire that takes less than 30 minutes to complete. CANADA VISA WAIVER REQUIREMENTS FOR BULGARIA - Valid Passport: Your travel document must be valid for six months from your arrival on Canadian territory. - Email address: Please make sure you have access to the email address you provided, as all the information we have about your ETA will be communicated to you through this email. - Payment Methods: You can use a credit or debit cards, but you can also use PayPal account to pay for the eTA fees. Media Contact Company Name: CANADA Visa Contact Person: Mukesh Sharma Rustam Email: Send Email Phone: +880 31-652225 Address:2293/A Zakir Hossain Rd, Chattogram Country: Bangladesh Website: www.canada-eta-visa.org/visa

author: María Camila Castiblanco, AFP
title: Selección Colombia femenina: cuándo vuelve a jugar en Olímpicos, hora y fecha - BluRadio
text: Luego de la amarga derrota de la Selección Colombia femenina ante Francia, pues se tuvo la esperanza de alcanzar el empate, las dirigidas por Ángelo Marsiglia deben pasar la página y prepararse para lo que será su segundo partido del Grupo A en los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024.¿Cuándo juega la Selección Colombia en París 2024?El segundo reto de la tricolor será el domingo 28 de julio desde las 10:00 de la mañana. Colombia enfrentará a Nueva Zelanda en el Grupo A.Las neozelandesas vienen de perder en su debut contra Canadá (1-2), por lo que ambos seleccionados están obligadas a sumar tres puntos si quieren clasificar a la siguiente ronda.¿Cómo fue el debut de Colombia en los Olímpicos?Francia dejó escapar una ventaja abultada y terminó sufriendo para vencer a la Colombia de Linda Caicedo (3-2) este jueves en el debut de ambas selecciones en el torneo femenino de fútbol de los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024.Las anfitrionas tenían pinta de protagonizar una goleada histórica en el estadio de Lyon, donde cerraron la primera parte con un 3-0 a favor gracias a un doblete de su delantera estrella, Marie-Antoinette Katoto (6, 42), que capitalizó errores de la zaga cafetera.La centrocampista Kenza Dali (18) completó el proyecto de paliza del combinado conducido por Hervé Renard, que en casa espera llegar al podio olímpico por primera vez.Pero las sudamericanas, orientadas por Ángelo Marsiglia, reaccionaron con fiereza en la segunda parte, en la que pudieron inclusive irse adelante si no fuera por la floja definición de la atacante Mayra Ramírez, expulsada (85) en la recta final del cotejo.A pesar de su poca eficacia, la delantera del Chelsea sufrió el penal que la goleadora histórica colombiana, Catalina Usme, transformó en el 3-1 parcial (54).La atacante Manuela Paví (64) aceleró los corazones franceses al cerrar las distancias con un baño sobre la portera Pauline Peyraud-Magnin.Las 'Bleues', líderes de la zona por encima de Canadá, que venció 2-1 a Nueva Zelanda más temprano en Saint-Étienne, volverán al ruedo el domingo.Ese día, en Saint-Étienne, disputarán la punta del grupo con las campeonas defensoras, mientras que las cafeteras y oceánicas esperan revivir en Lyon.

author: TReporta
title: Año Nuevo: Rituales para empezar el año
text:
Llegó el momento de despedirse del 2023 y recibir con todas las buenas vibras el Año Nuevo 2024, por esa razón Profesora de Tarot Lilia Korsi, nos trae cinco rituales para que atraigas tus deseos para el año que viene.
Cinco rituales para atraer el amor y la abundancia
A continuación, cinco rituales que te ayudarán atraer el amor y la abundancia en este Año Nuevo 2024:
Tips número 1
Materiales:
- Billete de 20 dólares o el que tengas
- Canela
- Zapato
Procedimiento:
Antes de las 12 de la media noche, coloca el billete con poquito de canela en polvo y luego ponlo en el zapato del pie derecho.
Esto ayudará a que atraigas estabilidad económica a tu vida, en este nuevo año.
Tips número 2
Materiales:
- Limones
- Sal
- Escoba
Procedimiento:
Colocar limones cortados en cuatro, con un puñado de sal. Lo colocas en las esquinas de la casa para recoger las energías negativas durante esos días, luego lo recoges y barres del centro de la casa hacia fuera.
Esto ayudará a que atraigas un Año Nuevo positivo.
Tips número 3
Materiales:
- 2 litros de agua
- Sidra
- Naranja
- Romero fresco
- Rosas rojas o amarillas
- Miel de abeja
- Aceite de esencias de rosas
Procedimiento:
Diluye en 2 litros de agua la sidra, corta una naranja en cuatro y la exprimes en el agua, agrega romero fresco, luego las rosas rojas o amarillas, cinco cucharaditas de miel y el aceite de esencias.
Luego colócalo una noche entera en la nevera y después te bañas por cinco días del cuello hacia abajo.
Esto ayudará atraer el amor de tu vida en este 2024.
Tips número 4
Materiales:
- Bowl
- Granos (Maíz, poroto, arvejas, etc.)
- 8 hojas de laurel
- Bolígrafo o piloto
- 8 clavos de olor
- 8 rajas de canela
- 8 monedas
- 1 vela blanca
Procedimiento:
En un bowl, escribe ocho deseos en las hojas de laurel, agrega los ocho clavos de olor, las rajas de canela, las monedas y por último enciende tu vela blanca.
Con este ritual, atraerás todos tus deseos del 2024.
Tips número 5
Materiales:
- 1 botella de vidrio
- Granos (Maíz, poroto, arvejas, etc.)
- Bolígrafo o piloto
- Billete de cualquier valor
- 8 anís estrellado
- 1 raja de canela
- Arroz
- Sal gruesa
Procedimiento:
En una botella de vidrio, coloca los granos de todo tipo, en el billete de cualquier valor le escribes los buenos deseos para el 2024 y lo enrollas hacia ti. Luego le agregas el anís estrellado, la canela, el arroz y la sal gruesa. Por último, la guardas y la vuelves abrir el próximo año, para ver si lograste cumplir todos tus deseos.
Con este ritual, atraerás la prosperidad para el año nuevo 2024.
